details.Applicability Period: Date of submission of application - up to 06.01.2025
details.Work Location: Uttar Pradesh Pollution Control Board, Head office T.C- 12V Vibhuti Khand, Gomti Nagar, Lucknow.
details.Eligibility Criteria: Essential requirement: Retired AE/EE from UPPWD, Uttar Pradesh Rakiya Nirman Nigam Ltd, Uttar Pradesh Rural Engineering Services, UP Housing and Development Board, Construction and Design Service (UP Jal Nigam) or Central Public Work Department having at least 10 years experience in Asset Management including Building maintenance, Central AC system Lift etc. and should have also knowledge regarding public procurement (NIT Proposal, Tender draft preparation and opening/finalising etc.)
details.Tenure: Tenure:- 06 Months from joining the service or till further order whichever is less.
details.Payment Details: Emoluments:- Fixed Pay per month will be 50% of last drawn pay (Basic pay+ DA.).
details.Application Instructions: Application shall be sent through email or post email:- ceoadmin@uppcb.in Post:-TC 12V Vibhuti Khand, Gomti Nagar Lucknow 226010.
details.Closing Date: The closing date for submission of application is 06-01-2025
